title: Group portrait of groom, wearing moustache, dark bow tie, and light colored carnation on left lapel, standing with bride holding hands, wearing mid length veil, earrings, light colored wedding dress with long floral lace sleeves and full skirt, holding bouquet in left hand, gathered in living room interior with patterned sofa and window with two toned blinds and leaf patterned curtains, possibly for Mohann wedding on Brushton Avenue in Homewood Brushton
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
